document.full_text: portugal will elect a new government on sunday which will lead the country through a period of deep austerity and recession after it received a 78-billion-euro ($114 billion) bailout from the european union and imf.
document.title: portuguese go to polls as country grapples with bailout
lines_and_colors: portugal will elect a new government on sunday which will lead the country through a period of deep austerity and recession after it received a 78-billion-euro ($114 billion) bailout from the european union and imf.
